oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oliver Tucker Seed Catalog
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Horticulture; Seed trade; Gardening; Farming; Seeds; Truck farming
Agriculture; Commercial catalogs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A soft cover seed catalog. Both the cover and back page are in color. The cover has a photograph of a cotton field, as well as a photograph of Oliver F. Tucker. Page 3 has a phtograph of Tucker, as well as a listing of the directors of the company. The company's motto is listed: "Do unto others as you would have them do unto you."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Oliver Tucker Seed Company
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On September 1, 1926, the Oliver Tucker Seed Company was organized with Oliver F. Tucker as president. Tucker had bought out the interest in the Tucker-Mosby Seed Company.
